newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: SOCCER-BARCELONA 1 PARIS ST GERMAIN 0 - RESULT.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-BARCELONA 1 PARIS ST GERMAIN 0 - RESULT.

text.p: Barcelona beat Paris St Germain 1-0 (halftime 1-0) in the final of the European Cup Winners' Cup on Wednesday.

Barcelona: 1-Vitor Baia; 12-Sergi, 26-Fernando Couto, 3-Abelardo, 2-Ferrer, 4-Josep Guardiola, 5-Gheorghe Popescu (18-Amor 46), 7- Luis Figo, 23-Ivan de la Pena (8-Hristo Stoichkov 85), 21-Luis Enrique (Juan Antonio Pizzi 89), 9-Ronaldo.

Paris St Germain: 1-Bernard Lama; 22-Didier Domi, 13-Lauren Fournier (17-Jimmy Algerino 58), 4-Bruno N'Gotty, 6-Paul Le Guen, 19-Jerome Leroy, 15- Benoit Cauet, 8-Vincent Guerin (9-Julio Cesar Dely Valdes 69), 7-Leonardo, 10-Rai, 11-Patrice Loko (26-Cyrille Bouget 78).
